features.title: Licence
features.description: Improved Licence system. Now on activate with work key it will return the active key if there is one. Also if you have an active key with les then 7 days remaining activating a new key will extend the new key duration wit the previous key remaining time.Also if there the key as more then 7 day time remaining the new key on activate will not activate it will return the old key

features.title: Expeditions/Dungeons
features.description: Britannia players have the option to automatically travel to Germany for dungeon runs when their expedition points reach 0. Once their dungeon points drop to 0, they will automatically return to Britannia. This cycle will continue as long as the player's expedition points hit 0 and they have accumulated at least 12 dungeon points. This allows for continuous play without manual intervention, maximizing both expedition and dungeon efficiency.
